describe: Singapore is a vibrant city-state located at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Known for its multicultural population, efficient public transport, and as a global financial hub, Singapore offers a blend of modern skyscrapers and rich heritage.

cities.name: üèù Singapore City
cities.geographical_location: Located on the southern coast of Singapore Island, at the mouth of the Singapore River.
cities.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with no distinct seasons, characterized by high humidity and abundant rainfall.
cities.famous_cuisine: Hainanese Chicken Rice, Chili Crab, Laksa, Satay
